content.detailedDescription:
- from carignan de bordeaux near bordeaux city aquitaine gironde
at home from my garden.
in the nigth of 15 august to 16 august 2009 at 00.23 am .
 my dog came outside then i follow him to play,then my eyes
 where cathed out by 4 red/glowish orange oval ligths in an horizontal   raw formation .Sky were very clear no fog , no clouds
they came from  north/north-est about 20��� above the horizon line.
( my first impression was that they were army copter but without 
signalisation fire-ligth but very soon i saw that their configuration were
 absolutly incompatible with
known human flying craft & neither fire works of course....!!!)

- the 4 ufo where hovering slowly in my direction within perfect silence during 2 minutes...
 during this time i ran in my house to cath my binocular & came back to my garden  .Then they turn to east/south-east direction at the same speed than before,which mean slowly.

- these ufo, now were following each other in line during 1.30 other minutes...Then suddenly the first & the second one in the line vanish
as if they dematerialised in transluscent state ...
20 secondes after the 2 others ufo craft made the same & vanish as the same way .
during this observation these cratf stayed at an constant slow speed.

-  my nickname is elyansun and i swear on my honor 
that this declaration is genuine 
- my personal information are reserved only to mufon's direction office and mufon's confirm third parties confirmed friends organisation for
investigations purpose,thanks a lot.

ps:joined snapshot are not mine but the  4 ufo i saw 15 aout 2009 at 00.23 am bordeaux are 100% the same  than az, august 13. 2009 mufon case:#18658
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Four orange glowish  oval  ufo hovering in raw slowly near bordeaux

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i was outside smoking about 10:00pm when i saw a football-sized and shaped object zoom across our back yard maybe 25 feet away from me, no more then 35 feet. it was blunted at one end and looked like it was galvanized gray metal. absolutely silent it flew underneath our yard light approximately 10 feet off the ground from east to west in a straight line.

i could see it clearly. i saw no evidence of a neck and head nor feet. i'm saying that it wasn't a bird as i saw no wings either. i watched it for about 40-50 feet as it entered my peripheral vision on the right then saw it clearly as i tracked it when it was directly in front of me until it was lost to view behind our pine tree, a distance of approximately 20 feet.

the entire sighting lasted about 2-3 seconds, not really long enough to make out great detail. i'm just sure that it wasn't a bird and that whatever it was it was moving fast.

it was about that time when our neighbor's dog to the west started barking wildly too.
content.summary: Streaked gray. rounded on front end- general football shape and size.

content.detailedDescription:
I moved to trafford, pa. in late january of this year. since doing so i have seen some very strange things. first it was the chemtrails. the spraying here has just slowed down in the last few weeks, but it has been constant and heavy since about mid february. i was really alarmed by it and the only reason i know the term "chemtrail" is because i started looking into what these planes were spraying. i had never even heard the term before this year. i have lived in pittsburgh my entire life. on the heaviest day of spraying in may i stopped for lunch at burger king in haymaker village. i decided to eat in my car and watch the planes as the sprayed an enormous grid over trafford and monroeville. i was sitting there and trying to figure out what the hell they were doing when something caught my eye near the top of the tree line. it was a dull gun metal black sphere about the size of a large beach ball. it was slowly moving along the tree line straight across from haymaker village. it was not a balloon or some sort of toy. it was controlled and its movement was very smooth and straight. there was no wind that day. i thought this occured in may, but it must have been earlier than that, because there weren't leaves on the trees yet. i kept looking around to see if anyone else saw it and i fwelt like i was going crazy. it appeared to have weight to it, i can't explain it...But i think if it fell out of the sky and hit you on the head you'd have a crushed skull. it was no balloon. i am asuning that it was under military control and that it was a surveliance drone of some kind. maybe to monitor the chemtrail activity
? it really affected me. i used to love walking my dog at night. i have not walked him at night since this event. i walk him in the morning and take him in the yard aty night. i don't like to be out at night for fear one of those things will be around and i won't even know it. i also took down the sheer drapes i had in my apartment and replaced them all with thermaback block out drapes. i have seen the big chemtrail x's and tic tac toe boards. i have seen heavy spraying in monroeville, trafford, murrysville, white oak and north versailles. i have seen black beams of light ( partical beams? )one with a military jet seemingly folllowing the path of the beam across the sky. i have seen pure white unmarked planes and military jets criss crossing the sky. i have watched the military aircraft create the giant x's. i have seen the chemtrail spray turned on and off in mid air-these are not contrails. i also saw one of the white planes vanish in front of my eyes in a clear blue cloudless sky. poof...Gone. like it had been erased. i have seen upside down oily rainbows in the sky. there have been alot of ufo reports out of the area. if anyone would like to talk to me about all or any of this i'd love a sounding board. you can email me at melissaanncan@yahoo.Com. it has been driving me crazy for months. i was so happy to see that someone else has posted about the sphere, although theirs was gray and mine was black. at least i know i'm not losing my mind. i intend to walk my dog at night again...I just have to work up a little more courage!
content.summary: Black " ball " slowly moving along top of tree line across from haymaker village,

content.detailedDescription: I was about to disconnect my extension cords from my boat's batteries located outside the storage area. i heard a humming to a whistling sound looked up it was hovering and at times moving left to right and back again. i reached for my cell phone and took one photo. it was white bright in color with a stream of light coming from the bottom to the ground. then after about twenty minutes it sped away. i thought it was a large commercial plane at first that had it's front landing light on. once it was closer and hovering moving left to right that is when it became surreal, seemed as if it wasn't really there.
content.summary: Disc shape white bright lights, light dropping in a line going downward to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
My wife took a bunch of avi  and still shots with her nikon cool pix. she goes outside on our deck to smoke every night.
she was having a cigarette about 1:am.  she was still outside when i came home. she told me she saw a ufo and she pointed to jupiter. i pulled out my cheap telescope and showed her that it was a planet. we went to bed and forgot about it.
on saturday morning she showed me the videos that she took. i couldn't believe what i saw. i still don't know what to think.

please review this avi and let me know what it is. it is definitely a pentagon shaped object.
we have a good amount of footage but it is all pretty similar.
except for what she took at the end. i think it may have been just a quivery light.
content.summary: Pentagon shaped  clockwise rotation  multiple light colors moves like hummingbird

content.detailedDescription:
About 7:15 pm sunday , a smoggy(visibility still good) but sunny north view from my 15th floor apartment, i am talking on the phone to a friend , and i look out the window to the horizon. to the left ahead i notice a ball descending from the sky towards the roof of factory#1. i take out my mini binoculars that i have on my window and look. it is a dark grey metal ball about 21/2to 3 feet in diameter that is reflecting sunlight on the left portion of it, (west side).It slowly makes its way across the horizon to factory #2(east) where it descends as if it was going to land, but it hovers over the roof momentarily, then goes up again and continues eastward to factory #3 where it slows down and hovers momentarily , then continues over the factory edge into the treed valley below. the factories are between 12 to 15 blocks away.It was not a bird or remote control plane.

i never see it emerge from the valley. i have never seen an object descend like that. i have seen hospital emergency helicopters and many, many airplanes of all sorts, but this was a metal ball.
i couldn't figure out what it was. it wasn't a bird. it wasn't a plane. then iconsidered a remote control plane, but the distance was too far and high for that, besides, it was a metal ball.
content.summary: A dark grey metal ball about 3 feet in diameter descended  slowly out of the sky and makes its way across three factory roofs(descending and ascending) eventually disappearing into a treed valley below

content.detailedDescription: I was in nashville, tn by the river (100 1st ave. n) listening to old crow medicine show. i saw a lady sitting in front of me point toward the sky, and when i looked up i saw four or five orbs of white light flying through the sky. it looked like an air show would, with the objects criss crossing each other and flying around each other but in no noticable formation. the orbs increased in number as i watched, at most there were twelve all flying together. there was no sound and the lights did not flash but dimmed and then brightened again. the lights were fairly dull and appeared to dim when the object was turning. the objects would make 90 degree angles at full speed and drop very quickly. there were also planes in the sky flying overhead toward the airport, but no aircraft flew through the circular lights. i kept waiting for the objects to collide, because they were flying so closely past each other. i thought the objects may have been private planes or test flights, but the more i looked at them, there were too many and they were flying to dangerously to be test flights. i also thought maybe it was some kind of laser or light show, but it was very cloudy and i saw no beams. the movement of these objects reminding me of the movement of fireflies. i was curious but not afraid and i wondered why no one else was watching these lights. no one seemed to notice them or think it was strange. the lights continued for over an hour, an hour and a half at most. the lights gradually disappeared a few at a time. i looked up and saw that two remained and the next time i looked they were all gone.
content.summary: Ufo swarm

content.detailedDescription: June 11, 2009 my family and i were traveling to califonia for vacation. we stop at rest stop near the az/califonia border my son pointed out a bight slow moving object that seemed to change colors from "bright" white, amber, orange, to a light blueish/purple. this object also seemed to change shapes from a tear drop, to some what of a cross which is what really caught my attention, then to an orb sort of shape? i was able to get 5 pix using a fugi f480 digital camera 8.2 mega pixel. 3 of the pix were shot around 6:30pm, the to night shots were take from a gas station just outside of indio  califonia, when my son informed me that it was still visable  and he had kept his eye on it since it first became visable to us back at the rest stop. sorry that i had not post this sooner, but i just came across the pictures yesterday!
content.summary: Ufo or baloon?

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were running up to the top of the hill in jessup pa (church st). i was going to a friends house because earlier we had thought we saw a ufo.  it turns out it was not a ufo.  while walking down the hill, my friend who is slightly skeptical saw a "star" appear out of nowhere.  there were no clouds that night.  i took 3 pics.  one while light blinked off, this shows an obvious solid object in the sky the fits the normal description of a ufo.  it is plain as day to me, but others may have their doubts.  the pics while the lights were on were odd-shaped, and different both times.  the object, though, is still lit up maybe from inside or the light was dimmed for some reason.  i am an avid "sky-watcher" and that is why i got a digital camera.  this is great for me, however, i have a computer from 1999 or 2000 and none of the software works so i cannot send the pics.  what should i do about that? i am going to try a friend's computer and see if i can send the pics from there.  it is important to me to get this out so if it is okay i will fill out another form here if i need to.  i was astonished the an hour later when i noticed it just may be a ufo!  everyone knows i would not make this up, so the picture is true and so is the story, and that makes me watch the sky even longer now! i will go to the nearest photo shop tomorrow and get these printed out.  there is also another pic i just noticed of a gray orb with almost symmetrical designs in it, it was in the sky, so i doubt it was a dust particle in front of the camera or anything like that.  ill include all personal information, contact me anytime between 11am -11pm 7 days a week.  these pics will be mailed within the week.  also, the work number listed is my mother's, i left it there in case i am not around, and i look forward to hearing from someone
content.summary: Saw blinking stationary light. took 3 pics 2 while light on and one with lights off

content.detailedDescription: While visiting sedona arizona on august 15th, 2009. we were driving in a vehicle waiting to visit a local establishment that was opening at 12:00 pm on saturday, august 15th. we were early, and because we were in the vicinity we drove up coffee pot drive. once we maneuvered through the neighborhood, we found ourselves at the base of coffee pot rock where i got out of our vehicle, walked down a small path and took a few pictures of the rock formation. i heard no sound, i saw no lights, and there was no breeze. i noted only one small cloud over the coffee pot rock formation when the picture was taken. approximate time of picture 11:55 am 8/15/09.
content.summary: Ufo picture captured over sedona

content.detailedDescription: We were in our vehicle driving north west on rebertson avenue when i noticed a very shiny object in the sky. i noticed the object because it was extremely bright. i stated to my family what is that. my fiance and her son and my son all seen the object. its stayed in the sky for approximately 30 seconds and then went north bound at a very high rate of speed and moments later it vanished. about five minutes later it appeared again for about 19 seconds and then it was gone.  the movements was in a vertical and then diagonal movements in a very straight path. it moved extremely faster then anything i have ever seen before. the object was like a bright crome with the sun beating off of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very shiny mirror like object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: After taking my sister home at 10 p.M. and stepping out to help her into her home, we noticed 3 fast moving objects-moving side by side, that appeared to come from nw.They were very high in altitude.We at first thought they might be satellites or something of that nature. while watching for 2 or 3 min., they stopped.The one on the left just disappeared, and then the middle one shot straight up and began to dart around left to right and up and down. the one on the right sat perfectly still and had a red, dome shaped top and brilliant white lights around the outside of the round or disc shaped bottom. the middle one rejoined this one and they flew off headed ne. my husband, my sister and i talked about it for a while. we were on ravenna rd. near glenwood dr. i asked my husband if we could go to liberty rd. where it is near a park and less bright lights, etc. for a better view. we pulled into a driveway near the visitor's center,turned our car off and got out. 2 object came up very suddenly from the west. they were flat and oblong and each had 3 very bright round lights on them. they were traveling slower than the first things we saw. they headed ne at a height that most small planes fly at.They stopped suddenly and the one on the left banked off to the left and headed slightly upward. it turned, came back down and beside the rt. one and they flew off to the east.  none of us felt afraid, which is strange.  we were all very calm.  we headed home and got there about 10:45p.M.
content.summary: This was definately not an imagined or false sighting.We saw objects and lights that did not come from ordinary aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
No airplanes were allowed in airspace since barrack obama is flying into phoenix. i was up late looking through my sky scout and noticed a ball of light streaking accross the sky, just like a satellite would. i notice that it was moving and flying in pattern that satellites don't. it from southeran sky to the north then erratic flying including altitude changes. this lasted for 15 minutes before it disappeared. i sat back down in my lawn chair and started to notice flashing lights from a plane, they were jets from lafb. there was at least 6 jets flying in teams of two very high and very fast towards the north sky, i stood up and looked at them and then noticed that they were following the ball of light that had returned. another interesting 
thing i observed, the fighter jets would turn off their blinking light when they were trying to chase this ball of light. the ball of light, from my perspective appeared to fly out into space. i would lose track the jet but after 30 minutes i could see them in pairs of two flying around the valley.

not much too describe about the ball of light. it appeared to be the same size as jupiter but had an orange tint to it's light. it was able fly really fast and several times it flew out of sight and would reappear. i quickly learned that by watching the fighter jets, i could spot the ball of light. they would break their pattern, so i would just look in the direction they were flying. 

very interesting night :)
content.summary: Ball of light flying fast around valley, luke afb jets (6-8) chase it

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i have a crazy story. i was coming out of walmart in boardman last night at a little after 11 pm. i was walking toward my vehicle and this light in the sky caught my eyes. i look up and saw 3 yellow lights in a straight line coming toward me. at first i thought hellicopters. thay were very low and moving very slow. then they changed formation and turned north toward lowes. i drove over to lowes parking lot and got out of my car. they went right over me and i couldnt hear any engine noise. thats crazy because they were low as emergency hellicopters fly. i should of heard some kind of noise. also i couldnt see any kind of shape to them which was also wierd because of how low they were. shortly after they passed over lowes they disappeared. as i was watching this a young couple pulled in and also saw this happening. it was unbelieveable and awsome!
content.summary: Three bright yellow flickering lights.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i was out  camping in croston on a campsite called the royal umpire. we was all sat out side the tent from about 9pm up until 11.45pm.Around 10.30pm my dad just said what the bloodyhell is that,as i looked round there was this bright orange glow in the sky moving quite slowley,it was a very clear sky not a cloud insight. with it being a family weekend i had my camera. i managed to get some photos then before our eyes it just seemed to disapere.As soon as it disapered we all got round the camera to have a look at the pictures id just taken and on the pictures there was 2 more red lights which was not visable to any of us when seeing the object in the sky. all 5 of us agreed there was no red lights, which really puzzled us when viewing the pictures. as soon as we got home we couldnt wait to get the pictures on the pc to view them on a bigger screen. hope someone will be able to put some light on this for us as we are all very excited by what weve seen.
content.summary: Bright orange light

content.detailedDescription:
As i was looking at the most up to date images from nasa's c3 lasco, i noticed 2 unknown objects. i've seen all kinds of planet transits, stars, comets, meteorites an the like; but this one is nothing i've ever seen before.

link:
http://sohodata.Nascom.Nasa.Gov/cgi-bin/data_query_search_url?Session=web&resolution=2&display=images&num%20img=30&types=instrument=lasco:detector=c3
http://sohowww.Nascom.Nasa.Gov//data/reprocessing/completed/2009/c3/20090816/20090816_0318_c3_512.Jpg
http://sohowww.Nascom.Nasa.Gov//data/reprocessing/completed/2009/c3/20090816/20090816_0242_c3_512.Jpg
content.summary: nasa's c3 lasco - unknown object

content.detailedDescription:
Went out on back deck to see the stars and look for meteorites before bed.
saw big dipper and counted approx. distance to morth star as i have done since i was a kid. as i was looking at north star another star? became visible approx. 1" held at arms length westerly from north star and gradually became brighter untill it was as bright as sirius. then this star started moving slowly towards west approximately 2" @a.L. and gradually disappeared.  i yelled to my friend but she was unstairs with her daughter and did not hear me. 2to3 minutes later the star reappeared stationary near big dipper and did repeat performance but this time when at it hightest brightness it made a small u motion and flashed off as if a switch had been turned off.  i am 58 years old and have been watching the sky my entire life, grew up with telescopes as a child and adolescent and have never seen anything like it before.  definitely not normal and wished my girlfriend had seen it.  extremely high in sky thus thinking it was star but stars do not move stop and move again.  conditions very clear great sky watching.  told some of my neighbors and they did not think i was crazy. we are all watching now.
content.summary: Light in sky not flashing.

content.detailedDescription:
While camping at a cabin in long lake near perth onatrio, my wife and i were sitting by the lake at a low burning camp fire looking at the stars, when i noticed a moving bright object( oval shape) moving from the north west moving to the south west. at first, i thought the object was a satalite, but it was moving too fast and the color was clearer, brighter and a lot lower in altitude. the object took about three minutes to clear the sky line start to finish. no sound was heard. no blinking lights was seen.
the object appeared the following night at the same time but with a different projectory and below overcast clouds. no stars were showning at that time because of the clouds.It was travelling at a high speed but again with no sonic boom or jet engine noise. this sighting was at long lake in ontario by perth and witness by my wife and myself on both nights.
i did manage to video tape the object on the second night but unfortunaity the video is low grade.
i am a retired military person with experience within avaition field and if this was military type aircraft, i only hope it was ours.
content.summary: At first, thought object was a satalite, but was moving too fast and color was clear & brighter and a lot lower in attitude. the object took about three minutes to clear the sky line. no sound was heard. no blinking lights was seen.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on a bench at alexander park here in windsor which faces belle isle in detroit, with my shiu-tzu after her walk, and was watching the 8:33 p.M. sunset!! about 5 minutes later i noticed what appeared to be a star glowing brightly through the blue of the sky. i noticed it because a jet flew above me and i watched it as it passed to the left side of the bright object.
 i thought at first i was seeing the planet venus because it was just that bright, but realized that venus would have been in the western  sky had it been setting, but i was facing roughly nne. i watched the object for about 2-3 minutes to see if it might have been a satellite or something but it was stationary. i watched it for about 10 minutes or so and looked down for a few seconds as a boat passed, and when i looked up again it was gone. i found this to be very odd because it should have still been there if it was a star or planet. i even waited until the sky began to darken to see if it would pop out into the deeper darkness of the sky but it was just simply gone. 
 i went back to the same spot today saturday august 15 and watched the sunset again and there was no sign of the star like object anywhere to be found. i used two radio towers in detroit as markers and the altitude was about 35 degrees up almost directly in front of me, so if it was a star it should have been there again tonight!!
 i don't know why i am so caught up in this but for some strange reason it has me feeling odd!! being an amateur astronomer i even looked up the area on a star chart and there is nothing of this magnitude that would have been in that area of the sky at that time. the fact that it would have outshone venus or jupiter is what prompted me to make this report!!
content.summary: Very bright star like spot in nnw clear blue sky!!

content.detailedDescription:
August 15, appx 9:45 pm

we had just gotten home from eating dinner out and were making last minute packing adjustments for an out of town trip first thing in the morning.  lexi t. arrived at our house, xxxx cannon road in twinsburg

after pulling into the driveway she called stephen f. on his cellphone as she was engrossed in watching the lights.  she told stephen f. that there were strange lights in the sky.  

stephen f. and laurie s. f. went outside and observed a diagonally ascending row of approximately 10 orange colored lights proceeding 
from e. ne. to w. nw. at a steady pace.  

laurie s. f. came in and told me, chris k. to come outside.  i ran outside onto cannon road at approximately 9:50 or perhaps a few minutes earlier and observed approximately 7 orange colored fiery
(illuminated) lights moving across the sky to the north at approx 20 degrees above the horizon.  at first i thought the lights were military helicopters on manouvers but shortly after beginning to watch them they began to "wink" out, turning off whatever illumination was being used.  once the orange illumination was extinguished there was no light remaining on the objects.   

we stood around talking about it in disbelief and then i ran inside to get my 35mm camera.  unfortunately i'm unfamiliar with the settings for night use so when i came back outside i wasn't able to take any photos of what happened next.  the orginal lights were gone but there was a single orange light approaching our location from the ne at a steady pace.  i was sure that it would shortly reach our location but before doing so the light went out.  no noise was heard in association with any of the objects.  

after this we discussed what had happened and lexi t. informed us that when she first pulled in the driveway and got out of her car the lights were very closely clumped together in a spherical shape.  once she summoned others the lights were already arranged in the diagonally "ascending" line from east to west.  

no one involved ever heard any sound associated with what was seen.
content.summary: Multiple orange lights moving across the night sky and then "winking" out.

content.detailedDescription:
During a sighting of several meteorites my son say's he say a object that looked like a meteorite but stopped for 2 seconds and then moved at several sharp angles, original coming down then made sharp angled immediate turns toward the opposite direction of the meteorites and then disappeared.

my son was outside at a friends house in the backyard playing on a trampoline when the took a break laid on it and looked up. he say's what drew his attention was at first he thought it was meteorite but when it behaved strangely he took note of it, he called a strange shooting star.
content.summary: Small white light with trail

content.detailedDescription: I was outside aug.13 about 5:30 and i took my dogs out i looked to the southwest and they had a star and bunch of blinking lights going on it would start like top, to side to bottom to top to the left side and so on, the bext day i went out and i looked to the north east an dthey had a simmilar thing going on, it was there for about an hr then it was gone. i thought i was kind of strange cause i never saw something like that before cause iam always up that early letting my dogs outside and never saw that before. what made me first notice it is that when iam outside iam always looking in the sky. they had no motion just the blinking lights around the star. i di dnot get up early that sat. cause i over slept but for 2 days in a row it was there but at different locations.
content.summary: It looked like a star.

content.detailedDescription: The alleged swamp creature in the florida ever-glads area seen over the years may be accounted for by the following incident per investigations and the u.S.Navy. allowing for a bombing run vietnam by  b-52's a alleged creature now matching the description was found in the area of the bombing run apparently, deceased. now, it is assumed for the following reasons, that the creature was in shock due to the percussion of the bombing run and later dilivered to a military base (or facility) in florida. while the creature was un bagged and laid out on the slab or room, perhaps pictures were taken? and/or discussions began as to what this creature could be?  apparently, over the next few days persons began to examine the creature and discuss the matter, then, after  a few days apparently, the creature disappeared one morning. it was assumed that some one had taked it but due to subsequent  inquiries and investigation's and piecing of the puzzle,over a period of years, it was determined that perhaps the swamp creature and the missing creature from the military base in florida captured from vietnam are one in the same. the descriptions are very similiar.Mufon could solve this case somewhere. per bernard mendez mufon field investigator#1038
content.summary: Bi-pedal creature found after b-52 bombing run

content.detailedDescription: Me and my neighbors were sitting on my porch last evening visiting on a beautiful night.  they (neighbors) have a habit since my last sighting that was close and so so mind blowing, of watching the sky.  took me a bit of time to come back outside and scan the skies after the triangle sighting few months ago..Kinda gives you a wow moment to see a strange craft closer than you think it should be.  had to deal with that experience in my adult life.  i also had one when i was a child but that one was easier to take.  i have already shared those experiences with mufon.  had a strange strong weird feeling i should look up at the sky. the feeling was like i was being asked to.  that definately was a weird feeling.   i looked up and saw a little star moving at a good rate of speed. it was very tiny. not something someone would notice because it was so dim but moving.  out of all the big expansive sky, i looked directly at this tiny tiny moving light and just kept staring at it..It was way way up there like it was meant to fit in with the stars.  all of a sudden it stopped directly within my sight and morph up with light brighter than the largest brightest star in the sky at the time.  i thought it was coming down towards us and that is why it was getting brighter but it wasn't..After a minute of putting on a good show of pulsating blinding light, it dimmed out and went on towards the southeast.  i had this happen to me couple months ago and we started waiving to the craft way up there thinking it would never know we were waving and saying hello.  that way up sighting was followed up with a low low triangle slow slow fly over 30 minutes later the very same evening.  my neighbor said last night,  are they saying hello again as this seems weird for things like this to happen right in front of your face.  guess they could be saying hello..Last night the star was like the craft that fly over the james gilliland ranch in wa state and get very bright and huge..Just wanted you to know i am back outside and have accepted what i see and i can't explain is no reason for fear. the lady i originally spoke with from mufon via email couple months ago really helped me ease my fear of what i witnessed then and suggested i give myself time.  i did.
content.summary: Baby star dimly shining and moving like the space station does, then wow, surprise surprise.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out on our patio when my wife saw something coming out the southwest skies.  i looked up and we both saw two roundish firery objects. one in front of the other.   the second object looked the same and was flanked behind the first object (not directly behind it).  the second object appeared a little larger than the first.  they appeared to be below the atmosphere but is hard to tell how high up they were.  i have viewed the space shuttle for many years and can say these objects behaved like a satelite or the shuttle behaves; no sound, straight line movement, and these objects faded away in the northeast sky much like the shuttle or a satelite.  the objects were bright.  much brighter than jupiter this time of year and with more mass.  orange, yellow appearance and they flickered like a flame.  again, they both moved in a straight line with no turns or variations. from southwest to northeast.  my wife and i could not explain these objects and were quite excited about the sighting.
content.summary: Two fiery objects came across the sky in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a really late drive through pleasanton at 4 in the morning, and on my way back home i saw two brightly shining orbs in the distance to my right. they were vertically parallel, and the bottom one was slightly bigger (ie. closer). because i'm deathly curious and and a ufo/alien fanatic, i immediately turned in that direction. gradually the bottom orb increased in size as i twisted through the neighborhood i'd entered, and before i knew it i was almost directly beneath it.

no longer appearing as an orb, the ufo was extremely close enough to the ground; i'm not great with measuring distances, but to give you an idea, to my vision it was about the size of making circle with your index finger and thumb. it was rather egg-shaped, if the egg were on its side, and it appeared to be black, although it's hard to distinguish color at night. i remember the arrangement of the ship's lights looking rather like three, bright bug-eyes.

as i raced through the suburban streets to keep pursuit, the ufo slowly flew overhead at a constant pace. eventually it decided it was done there (or as i like to believe, wanted to lose me) and picked up speed so it was impossible to continue the chase. i watched it fly away from me, and suddenly it was above the hills on the far side of town.

hopeful to see more, i drove in that direction, and during this drive i saw two more very shiny orbs hovering on either end of town. after waking up another space-loving friend of mine to watch the two, i changed course for a nearby set of hills one of them seemed to be over. when the orb didn't get any bigger after a short hike, i gave up, but from that hill i had a fantastic view of one of the ufos directly above the center of the valley.

as the sun was coming up around 6am, i finally drove back to my home on the outskirts of town only to clearly see one of the ufos directly above the neighboring town of livermore in the morning sky.
content.summary: Three or more ufos observe pleasanton and the tri-valley area; i observe them right back.

content.detailedDescription: Went out back about 10pm to see if the unidentified object would show up 2nights in a row? my 12 yr old was with me as we recorded about 20-30 mins of what i thought was just another ordinary bright star, this object didnt put the show the object i recorded the previous night did! but, after watching the video on a larger screen the object that i have on tape is more than an ordinary bight star, it has a distinct diamond/saucer shape with the light or lights circling the center of the object and exposing a perfect silouet of the top and bottom of this object. while tonight object didnt have the wow factor that the object i taped on 8/13 it was still impressive and is something that needs to be investigated by someone with a little more knowledge of ufo etc. thewse sighting have me a little scared nervous!
content.shape: Chevron,  Diamond,  Egg,  Fireball,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Star-like,  Other
content.summary: Second night in a row i have video footage of something in the arizona sky!!

content.detailedDescription: Alien triangle ship on the surface of the moon as seen through google earth's moon. if you look closely at the alien ship you will see it is 1000's of feet wide, shaped like a triangle, to the right point you can see a front and top. the feet or landing gear in the front look like insect pincers or fang shapes. you can also observe there are no impact marks around it.
content.summary: Triangle observed in google earth/moon  @ 8°53'48.37"n 60° 4'54.77"e

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home from an engagement, going south on south lewis avenue to the intersection of 51st street and south lewis.  we stopped at the traffic light for a few minutes and both noticed a bright flashing white light, about the intensity of a commercial aircraft landing light but it appeared to be a tad brighter.  it was just over the power lines in the distance, slightly to the east of lewis avenue.  my first thought, because of altitude and where it appeared (near jenks airport and close to flight path for tulsa airport), that it was a commercial jet on approach but upon seeing the white flashing light, i knew it was something else.  the light appeared to be stationary in the sky.  our next thought was it could be a antenna light on top of a building, but they are always red and i had never seen this light before at night.  it was flashing on and off every 2 seconds.  the flashing pattern was similar to a light at the top of a tower.  as we continued driving towards home, we watched the light and it was not moving.  so we decided to check it out.

we drove south on lewis toward east 61st street and the light appeared to be stationary just in front and above us, at the west edge of the southern hills golf course and slightly east of lewis avenue.  a helicopter flew underneath the light at a lower altitude from east to west and began a circle to the south.  as we got closer, the light appeared to have projections (wings?) on both sides of the light.  at the end of each projection was a red light with a green light beside it.  keeping an eye on the light, which was now directly above us and slightly to our left, i opened my window and we pulled into the bank parking lot just south of 61st as i opened the sunroof for a better look.  we stopped in the parking lot within a few seconds after turning off lewis and looked up at the light.  nothing.  it was gone.  we scanned the sky around us and saw nothing.  we heard no sound from it.  after setting for a few minutes trying to figure out where it went and what we saw, we noticed the helicopter flying by in the distance and heading north, leaving the area.  the weather was clear and i don't think the moon had risen yet.

but this is not the end of the story.

i was laying in bed at about 11:00pm later that night and couldn't sleep.  the blinds were open.  with the blinds open, i have a good view of the southwest portion of the sky.  i have seen, at night, helicopters flying overhead, some using search lights (probably police helicopters), and an occassional plane going to jenks airport.  they are easily heard as they pass overhead.  well, this time i saw something i haven't seen before.  at a very low altitude, i saw what looked like two bright headlights of a car, with a space between the lights (like a car) and a faint blinking red light between the bright lights.  it flew over the house at a relatively slow speed, but faster than, say, a helicopter.  and unlike other craft i've seen passing by, it was completely silent.  i hopped up and ran to the backyard but it was gone and it did not return while i was awake.

end of report.
content.summary: Stationary ufo with flashing white light sighted in south tulsa, oklahoma on august 13, 2009.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs eastward along the sidewalk and above the tree line across the street was a bright orange ball.  it appeared to be stationary and i thought to myself that it was strange that i never noticed that object before.  then it occurred to me that this object had never been there before so i began to try to determine if it was moving.  

initially, it appeared to me to have three streaks of orange light emanating from the bottom.  at no time did i hear any sounds except for those of the cars driving along the street.  if i had to compare it to a real life object, i would compare it to a bright orange, luminous hot air balloon.

i walked southward and could not discern if it was moving in the opposite direction than i was walking or if it was stationary.  i continued to look away in the direction i was walking and then look back.  during this process of my looking away and looking back, it seemed as if the object changed it's position in the sky by about 100 feet during the moments that i was not watching it.  the object continued to be about parallel with me as i walked.  i would continue to turn my head and check on it every few feet and it did appear to be moving very, very slowly.  then, when i turned to check again, it was so far away that it only appeared as if three small points of light consisting of two red and one yellow.  

i figured that the experience had concluded and i began walking back toward my street.  it was not much more than one to two minutes later that i felt the urge to turn around and there it was again hovering over the treetops of the houses across the street.  as before, it was either stationary or moving very slowly.  i watched as i walked and kept trying to find a plausible explanation for this orange light.  as i continued on my route back home i lost sight of it due to trees obscuring my view.
content.summary: The shape was like an upside down horseshoe and it was bright orange, with the quality, brightness, and color of a neon light
